User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system.

role.description: Role of the user (e.g., super_admin, admin, user).

createdAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp indicating when the user was last updated.

rentalCost.description: Cost per hour for renting the facility.

sports.description: List of sports supported by the facility.

adminId.description: Reference to the Admin user who manages this facility.

equipmentIds.description: List of equipment IDs available at the facility.

Equipment.title: Equipment
Equipment.description: Represents a piece of sports equipment.

rentalCost.description: Cost per hour for renting the equipment.

facilityId.description: Reference to the Facility this equipment belongs to.

FacilityRequest.title: Facility Request
FacilityRequest.description: Represents a user's request to add a new facility.

userId.description: ID of the user who made the request.

userEmail.description: Email of the user who made the request.

userName.description: Name of the user who made the request.

createdAt.description: Timestamp of when the request was created.

updatedAt.description: Timestamp of when the request was last updated.

definition.description: Stores user profile data. The 'role' field is informational. Actual permissions are determined by the 'roles_*' collections.
Stores sports facility data. Includes denormalized 'adminId' for authorization independence.
Stores individual pieces of equipment that can be associated with facilities.
Stores user requests for new facilities.
A document in this collection signifies that the user with the ID 'userId' has the 'admin' role. The document itself can be empty.
A document in this collection signifies that the user with the ID 'userId' has the 'super_admin' role. The document itself can be empty.
